name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize Tweet: I Ain't Reading All That

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize Tweet: I Ain't Reading All That lets you shorten long-form tweets using GPT-3.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lets you summarise long-form tweets. Using GPT-3, this extension provides you with a quick, easy-to-read summary of long-form tweets.
